name: Portfolio Awesome – Responsive WordPress Porfolio Plugin
author: Themes Awesome

sections.description:
Portfolio Builder Awesome WordPress Plugin

Portfolio Awesome is a WordPress portfolio plugin that will help you showcase your project’s results or work in an easy and fast way. This plugin makes it easy for you to put your Portfolio anywhere on your WordPress website with the click of a button.

Suppose you are a photographer, designer, artist, and other professional work or company/organization looking to showcase your work on your WordPress website. In that case, Portfolio Builder is the right choice for you. Especially if you are already familiar with elementor page builders, you will love this plugin.

WHAT YOU WILL GET?

Portfolio Awesome allows you to showcase your work on your WordPress website easily. With 200+ Hover Options, 15 Preload Effects, 32 Portfolio, ready-made templates are ready to make Your WordPress website memorable than before. It will save a lot of money on showcasing Portfolio for your website.

Portfolio Awesome provides almost everything you need to display a modern, beautiful, and stunning portfolio. With various functions and layout options that keep your website attractive and engaged with the user.

This WordPress portfolio plugin provides customization options that are familiar with WordPress users. After creating the portfolio showcase, You can insert the showcase anywhere on the website using a shortcode, Elementor, or Gutenberg

Live Demo

PORTFOLIO AWESOME FEATURE

  • Grid layout
  • Masonry layout
  • Carousel Layout
  • Pagination
  • Number pagination
  • Customize Title Color
  • Customize Facts Color
  • Customize Background Hover Color
  • Customize Button Text Color
  • Customize Button Background Color
  • Customize Button Text Hover Color
  • Customize Button Background Hover Color
  • Customize Loading Background Item
  • Customize Pagination Default Color
  • Customize Pagination Default Background Color
  • Customize Pagination Default Hover Color
  • Customize Pagination Default Background Hover Color
  • Portfolio single custom link
  • Portfolio Column Option
  • Portfolio Column on Tablet Option
  • Portfolio Column on Mobile
  • Portfolio Padding option
  • Portfolio Width
  • Portfolio Height
  • Insert Portfolio using Elementor block

Learn more about Portfolio Add-on
Advanced Grid || Advanced Masonry || Advanced Carousel

Get up and running with only 3 step

  1. Creating The Portfolio Item
  2. Creating a Portfolio Showcase
  3. Insert to a page with the shortcode, elementor, Gutenberg

YOU CAN USE THIS PLUGIN IN MANY WAYS. PORTFOLIO AWESOME IS ALSO SUITABLE FOR CREATING:

  • Company History Timeline
  • Personal Achievement Timeline
  • Career Achievement Timeline
  • Portfolio Timeline
  • Products Roadmap / Release Cycles Timeline
  • Event Timeline
  • Tutorial Timeline
  • Customer History Timeline
  • Program History Timeline
  • Product History Timeline
  • Fashion History Timeline

Advanced Grid Portfolio Builder – Add-Ons

Advanced Grid Portfolio Builder is an additional function of the Portfolio Awesome WordPress plugin, which allows you to have more customization options and grid layout optimization.

Unique animation of hover shows an animation where the portfolio information section rises to the top to shift the image’s position, looking stunning together with a rectangular grid style.

You will get these extended features from Advanced Grid Portfolio Builder :

  • 200+ Hover Options
    You can change the hover as You like from 200+ Hover choice
    Try the hover options
  • 15 Preload Effect
    Choose preload effect of Grid portfolio from 15 stunning load effect
    Try the hover options
  • 13 Unique style template
  • Portfolio Filter
  • Load More Pagination
  • Infinite scroll pagination
  • Category display portfolio
  • Specific post portfolio
  • Lightbox
  • Center Pagination Align
  • Left Pagination Align
  • Right Pagination Align
  • Customized Pagination Load More Text Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Background Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Text Hover Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Background Hover Color

ADVANCED GRID PORTFOLIO DEMO

  • GRID 2 COLUMN
  • GRID 3 COLUMN
  • GRID 4 COLUMN
  • GRID 5 COLUMN
  • GRID 6 COLUMN
  • GRID 7 COLUMN
  • GRID 8 COLUMN
  • GRID HIJI
  • GRID DUA
  • GRID TILU
  • GRID OPAT
  • GRID LIMA
  • GRID GENEP
  • GRID TUJUH

Advanced Masonry Portfolio Builder – Add-Ons

Advanced Masonry Portfolio Builder is an additional function of the Portfolio Awesome WordPress plugin, which allows you to have more customization options and masonry layout optimization.

Unique animation of hover shows an animation where the portfolio information section rises to the top to shift the image’s position, looking stunning together with a rectangular grid style.

You will get these extended features from Advanced Masonry Portfolio Builder :

  • 200+ Hover Options
    You can change the hover as You like from 200+ Hover choice
    Try the hover options
  • 15 Preload Effect
    Choose preload effect of Grid portfolio from 15 stunning load effect
    Try the hover options
  • 14 Unique style template
  • Portfolio Filter
  • Load More Pagination
  • Infinite scroll pagination
  • Category display portfolio
  • Specific post portfolio
  • Lightbox
  • Center Pagination Align
  • Left Pagination Align
  • Right Pagination Align
  • Customized Pagination Load More Text Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Background Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Text Hover Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Background Hover Color

ADVANCED MASONRY PORTFOLIO DEMO

  • MASONRY 2 COLUMN
  • MASONRY 3 COLUMN
  • MASONRY 4 COLUMN
  • MASONRY 5 COLUMN
  • MASONRY 6 COLUMN
  • MASONRY 7 COLUMN
  • MASONRY 8 COLUMN

  • MASONRY TUJUH

Advanced Carousel Portfolio Builder – Add-Ons

Advanced Carousel Portfolio Builder is an additional function of the Portfolio Awesome WordPress plugin, which allows you to have more customization options and masonry layout optimization.

Unique animation of hover shows an animation where the portfolio information section rises to the top to shift the image’s position, looking stunning together with a rectangular grid style.

You will get these extended features from Advanced Carousel Portfolio Builder :

  • 200+ Hover Options
    You can change the hover as You like from 200+ Hover choice
    Try the hover options
  • 15 Preload Effect
    Choose preload effect of Grid portfolio from 15 stunning load effect
    Try the hover options
  • 9 Unique style template
  • Portfolio Filter
  • Load More Pagination
  • Infinite scroll pagination
  • Category display portfolio
  • Specific post portfolio
  • Lightbox
  • Center Pagination Align
  • Left Pagination Align
  • Right Pagination Align
  • Customized Pagination Load More Text Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Background Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Text Hover Color
  • Customized Pagination Load More Background Hover Color

ADVANCED CAROUSEL PORTFOLIO DEMO

Architect Carousel Porfolio
Multiple Carousel that appears with a minimalist and modern theme displays your portfolio in a single line carousel that allows you to customize its options.

Art Gallery Carousel Portfolio
A carousel that allows you to display multiple portfolio content with a 3d perspective, Coverflow 3D style with boxed portfolio types that you can customize in the portfolio showcase options.

Furnitur Carousel Porfolio
The slide no Gap carousel allows you to showcase multiple image content that will be beautiful with strikingly colored images. Carousel’s style stands out with the animated hover of the fold in the information section of the portfolio.

Ilustrator Carousel Porfolio
Unique carousel view with the diagonal arrangement and diagonal moving images too. With navigation arrows in the picture plus a beautiful animation in the photo with animated text.

Interior Carousel Porfolio
Multiple Carousel Auto Width shows your content image with different widths. The image will appear depending on the width of the picture.

Fashion Lookbook Carousel Porfolio
A combination of Centered Carousel and Auto Width Carousel looks excellent with free space on the right and left of the Carousel so that you can put something interesting there. Combined with image displays of different widths, making a stunning showcase.

Model Carousel Portfolio
Unique design with diagonal carousel style, navigation arrows on mouse also hover “plus” icon to portfolio singles and “cross” icon to close portfolio singles. Looks very modern, beautiful, and stunning.

Restaurant Carousel Porfolio
Centered Carousel looks beautiful and stunning with the hover animation push from the bottom to the top, so the image of the content is still visible.

Wedding Carousel Porfolio
Carousel with Multi-Row Layout can put a multi-row content in a carousel that can slide. Besides that, there are still many options that you can customize to match the theme of your WordPress website.
sections.faq:
Is there a time period for using Portfolio Builder Awesome?

No, you can use Portfolio Builder Awesome onwards.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! Portfolio Builder Awesome will Works With Any Theme

How do I translate the plugin?

We recommended Loco Translate for translate.for details on how to use it you can read our online documentation.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • UPDATED : Sanitizing and validating input text
  • UPDATED : Validating output and translate strings

1.0.10

  • UPDATED : Fixing bugs on portfolio slider
  • ADDED : Fields for customize

1.0.9

  • ADDED : Style Slider

1.0.8 – Advanced Justified Portfolio Builder

  • ADDED : Style Justified Full Image
  • ADDED : Style Slider Full Image
  • ADDED : Single Portfolio Layout
  • FIXED : jQuery not defined carousel when logged out

1.0.7 – Advanced Carousel Portfolio Builder

  • ADDED : Padding bottom and top to single portfolio post
  • UPDATED : Change link to bit.ly
  • UPDATED : Container to 1080px
  • FIXED : ta_pba_change_font_to_upper PHP error
  • FIXED : Lightbox not working

1.0.6

  • ADDED : New fields carousel
  • FIXED : Fatal error if no Elementor plugin
  • FIXED : Fatal error if plugin add-on not active but function still called

1.0.5

  • FIXED : Fix Shortcode
  • ADDED : Style Masonry Card
  • ADDED : Style Carousel Card

1.0.4

  • UPDATED : Showcase options content
  • ADDED : Style Grid Card
  • ADDED : Field Custom Link Portfolio

1.0.3

  • ADDED : Category to admin panel post portfolio column
  • UPDATED : Showcase options layout
  • FIXED : Select categories not showing in portfolio post editor
  • FIXED : Single showcase carousel not working

1.0.2

  • ADDED : Showcase layout image
  • UPDATED : Showcase options layout
  • UPDATED : Showcase column option to 8 column
  • FIXED : Styling Elementor

1.0.1

  • FIXED : Single showcase post
  • FIXED : Gutenberg block showcase
  • FIXED : Showcase shortcode not showing in page
  • UPDATED : Showcase options layout

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
